main event: USAF pilots reported sighting a huge multi-colored ball of fire trailing a dense cloud of smoke over Green River, Utah, on February 18, 1948.
interesting points: The object was spotted at around 1500 MST over Green River, Utah., It was observed by multiple USAF pilots in the 28th Bombardment Group., It was estimated to be at an altitude of 20,000 feet and traveling at high speed., The pilots reported the object had a huge size and that it emitted a vapor trail., The sighting lasted for about 1-2 minutes.
sighted object: huge multi-colored ball of fire and a dense cloud of smoke
